name: Zombie Thing
description:
A zombie survival game released on Google Play Store, released for android.

Planned for IOS release.

Updates almost every day, and is currently in development.

I made a PC port to try out the game. It's currently free on the Google Play Store.

To report bugs or suggestions to improvements, I have made a google form, or feel free to post or comment anywhere. Thanks!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeM0EaGMLY5XSpZFzY9LMwgC2qIltrj4xO7Jwxz...

Planning to add more maps, zombie types, guns, and equipment like turrets.

I will also keep improving game mechanics, currently re-working the repair mechanic to be free, and a skill that can be upgraded.
